data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=EKbtoh0CJ9UQ7kNvgHR1kE9&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYC-nqUJ4E-eGuMgrW_sbZd1b5ceC3Yg13rZSv4p-jB0Ag&oe=66434937)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=o0pfG43KH5wQ7kNvgGYiIjd&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYD9i8SEDgb70h8Yg9SvRCVj_hEFrT58bdMtQJqwntNd4A&oe=664356D2)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982555_716104293832637_6157177355803125122_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=2uOi117OgLwQ7kNvgF7Xxk1&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYB_lh1pZfHRstEF0D82mDBgtpT-NfYLpg6o3T95fVnkCA&oe=66435A50)
